description.narrative: The youth leaders will be attached to the existing ?ABC-project? (funded by ODW) The main objective of the ABC-project is to create inclusion for young people with disabilities in Uganda by increasing self-confidence and creating access to inclusive communities, including increased job opportunities through vocational training The youth leaders will start the exchange in the 3rd and 4th quarter of the project The aim of the youth leader exchange is to strengthen the youth inclusion in the ABC-project and they will play a key role in showing community and other Youth with Disabilities (YWD) that youth inclusion is important This will happen in the different activities in the different districts of Uganda where the Youth Leaders are planned to stay

participating-org.narrative: SUMH - Sammenslutningen af Unge med Handicap
